remarks: Limit of a continuous function on an open subinterval.  Upper bound version.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem33.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem33.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem33.3 $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
fourierdlem33.4 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( ( A (,) B ) -cn-> CC ) ) $.
fourierdlem33.5 $e |- ( ph -> L e. ( F limCC B ) ) $.
fourierdlem33.6 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem33.7 $e |- ( ph -> D e. RR ) $.

fourierdlem33.ss $e |- ( ph -> ( C (,) D ) C_ ( A (,) B ) ) $.
fourierdlem33.y $e |- Y = if ( D = B , L , ( F ` D ) ) $.
fourierdlem33.10 $e |- J = ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t ( ( A (,) B ) u. { B } ) ) $.
fourierdlem33 $p |- ( ph -> Y e. ( ( F |` ( C (,) D ) ) limCC D ) ) $.
